item.title: Privacy policy
item.content:encoded:
WordTiles

Privacy policy

Macplugins built the WordTiles app as a Commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by Macplugins and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform users regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.

Information Collection and Use

WordTiles DOES NOT collect, transmit, or store any data. Period.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at support@macplugins.com.

item.title: New website (using Publish)
item.content:encoded:
New website (using Publish)

The web site I have to provide information required by my mobile apps is very simple, but I did not like dealing with HTML or web site generators online. Too difficult for me given what little I have to offer on a web site. When I found John Sundell's Publish tool, I decided to play around with that. It let me focus on what little content I have, notably privacy policies, in a way that is more familiar. Markdown files. So this web site is now generated from a Swift package and updated as needed with my hosting provider.

Publish

Publish is a static site generator built specifically for Swift developers -- his words. My needs are simple and my updates rare, this lets me put things together using a collection of Markdown files that include hints in them to help Publish generate the website. Here's a link to the project he published: Publish
